title: Please Stay
description: A partnership between the Born This Way Foundation, which supports the mental health of young people, and Find Your Anchor, a grassroots movement aimed at suicide prevention, awareness, and education, this site provides resources for support as well as evidence-based self-care tips. It includes a number of animated elements, including Easter egg surprises, rotating lists, and SVGs that draw visitors’ attention.

title: Strawdog Theatre
description: In this project, I redesigned a theater company’s previous static site, reorganizing and adding content to enhance the user experience. I also developed it in Craft CMS for easy updating. The homepage is animated on first visit to draw the user in and hint at the dynamic nature of the company’s work.
